Unfinished time tracker app

Planned name: Fractime

Overview

  • Try the demo
  • Source code: https://github.com/jegfish/fractime
  • Technology stack:
    • React
    • RxDB for offline in-browser storage

Feature list

  • Stopwatch-style timer
  • Tagging
    • Create a tag with “Add tag”.
    • Click on a tag to select it for the current timer.
  • Sticky tags
    • Click on a tag’s checkbox to set it to sticky mode. It will stay on between timer start/stop.
    • An example use case is you have a main “work” tag, then other tags to describe specific tasks like “research” or “email”. You can set the work tag to sticky so you don’t need to reselect it when you switch tasks.
  • Offline storage in the browser. Saves the active timer, past timers, and tags.
  • Accumulate break time as a fraction of active time. For example for every 3 minutes you log on the timer, you save up one minute of break time.
    • This is inspired by Third Time.
